Job Description:
ENGINEERING INTERN

Location: Bangalore

This is a 3-6 month long internship you will be given charge of one of our exploratory projects in UAV, sensors, data analytics, image processing and machine learning OR tasked with building out a major feature in our roadmap on either our consumer app or our intelligent farm management software. When you apply, please apply with a github profile, or otherwise attach examples/code samples of specific projects/products you may have worked on, and indicate your preference in terms of area of work.
